LanguageData.HS_Virtuous_Clan.label: Virtuous Clan
LanguageData.HS_Virtuous_Clan.description: A collection of Ronin, samurai and peasants who lost their previous homes. These people choose to band together and walk a virtuous path.
LanguageData.HS_Bandit_Clan.label: Bandit Clan
LanguageData.HS_Bandit_Clan.description: Bandits, pirates and bloodthirsty Ronin are the backbone of this Clan. They salvage the remains of clans long lost, using stolen armor to masquerade as a legitimate Samurai.
LanguageData.HS_PlayerEdoClan.label: New Clan
LanguageData.HS_Edo_Shogunate.label: Divine Shogunate
LanguageData.HS_Edo_Shogunate.description: A collection of Ronin, samurai and peasants who lost their previous homes. These people choose to band together and walk a virtuous path.
